properties.address: Armadillo Youth Cafe & Venue, Bristol, Avon BS37 4FW
properties.description: The Armadillo is a community building located within Yate Shopping Centre opposite Morrisons Supermarket. The venue provides a range of community services, activities and projects throughout the week as well as being a Warm Welcome Space at designated times during the week.
properties.title: Armadillo Youth Cafe & Cinema

properties.description: Individual comfy chairs, space is heated to 18 degrees, tea, coffee and biccies with hot soup on alternate Thursdays. 9.30 to noon or 14:30 on Thursdays: Hearty soup lunches on alternate Thursdays. Services on 2nd,3rd & 4th Sundays, Check the website for dates
properties.title: Box Methodist Church

properties.address: 88 Station Road, Yate, South Glos BS37 4PH
properties.description: We are a community run cafe open Wednesday's between 1pm and 3pm. All are welcome. We serve hot drinks and cake, and soup and a roll during the colder months. There are puzzles and games for any children who visit and you are welcome to borrow a book from our little library shelves. We regularly have folk sharing skills, for example, during the last few months we have painted rocks, made Christmas decorations, and learned how to make some stunning mosaics. We've also had a local choir visit and have other exciting things planned.
properties.title: Candle Community Cafe

properties.address: Yate Town Council, Bristol, Avon BS37 5PP
properties.description: Poole Court was built in the early 1850’s. Originally, it was a grand family home, situated in the middle of green fields just off Turnpike Road, which is now Station Road. Poole Court now houses the Town Council offices and a number of community rooms, which are let to groups and organise.

properties.address: Chipping Sodbury Baptist Church, Chipping Sodbury, South Gloucestershire BS37 6AH
properties.description: The Oasis at CSBC is a community wellbeing space where everyone is welcome. It is hosted by Chipping Sodbury Baptist Church (CSBC). Come in for coffee and a chat, share a hobby, join an activity and perhaps make a new friend. A variety of activities take place on a regular basis throughout the week/month - please see our website for more details The Oasis will be closed between Christmas and New Year (Fri 22 December 2023 to Tues 2 January 2024.
properties.title: Steph Green

properties.address: The Pop In Cafe, Bristol, Avon BS37 4AX
properties.description: The Pop Inn is a Community Café designed for users over 50’s. The Café is located between Yate Library and Yate Leisure Centre and opened its doors on 31 August 2001. Since then, it has warmly welcomed thousands of people aged fifty and over from the Yate and surrounding area.
properties.title: The Pop Inn Cafe (Over 50's)

properties.description: Open to all
properties.title: Yate heritage Center

properties.address: Yate Heritage Centre, Bristol, Avon BS37 5BG
properties.description: Yate & District Heritage Centre is a fully accredited museum which, as part of Yate Town Council, serves all our local communities. The Centre was created in 1995 to provide facilities for displaying aspects of Yate’s past history and for providing archive and research facilities for the storage of artefacts, documents, maps and photographs relevant to Yate. In 2000, the Centre was relocated to a new venue next to St Mary’s Church; the site of former stables dating from the 1840’s, behind the historic White Lion Pub. Yate Town Council funded and supported the creation of the purpose-built exhibition galleries and a workroom which houses the archive and also provides storage space.
properties.title: Yate Heritage Centre
